arrow_to_mlr3

Source: R/mlr_report.R
arrow_to_mlr3.Rd

Converts arrow Table/Dataset to mlr3 Backend

Usage

arrow_to_mlr3(dataset, primary_key = "I")

Arguments

dataset

arrow::Table or arrow::Dataset

primary_key

character name of the column to use as a primary key

Value

mlr3db::DataBackendDplyr
